definition[0]: to kill or injure someone by holding their throat very tightly so that they cannot breathe
example[0]: He grabbed her by the throat and began throttling her.
definition[1]: to make it difficult or impossible for something to succeed
example[1]: policies which are throttling many Asian economies
definition[2]: to slow down the speed of an Internet connection
definition[3]: a piece of equipment that controls the amount of fuel going into a vehicleâ€™s engine
